mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Blessing, Francis M.
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Xenia, Green Co., O [Xenia, Greene County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Blessing, Francis M. Patient Age: 20. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: Gun shot fracture left hand. Location Wounded: In action . Date Wounded: 1863/07/24. Nature of Wound: Buckshot. Result: Discharged from service on Surgeon's Certificate for disability on May 23rd, 1865. The description last has been forwarded by Doct. Skilling when Lunsfired [?] to Parkersburg, Sept. 27th, 1864. .
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Blessing, Francis M.
Gun shot fracture left hand
Private
F
36th O V I [36th Ohio Volunteer Infantry]
Ohio
Hospital Number 5735
